officialTitle: Prospective Randomized Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Rabbit Antithymocyte Globulin 3mg/kg vs. 6mg/kg in Kidney Transplant Patients Under Steroid-free and CNI Minimization Maintenance Immunosuppressive Regimen
inclusionCriteria:
* Primary kidney transplant recipients, adults
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 75 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* PRA \> 50%
* DSA \> 1500 MFI
* Retransplantation
* Patients who are planning to receive mycophenolate instead of everolimus
* Patients who have planning for follow-up in another center
